raw_text: ASSALAARACHCHI – BANDULA (Retired Merchant Navy Officer). Husband of Melanie Jayawardena. Son of late Mr. Norman & Mrs. Nanda Assalaarachchi (Benthota),​ Son-in-law of late Mr. Gamini Jayawardene & Mrs. Mallika Jayawardene,​ beloved father of Dr. Chirath Assalaarachchi (Derby,​ UK),​ Goyum Assalaarachchi (Toronto,​ Canada),​ father-in-law of Dr. Ninoshi Palihawadana (Derby,​ UK) beloved grandfather of Kian and Zara,​ expired.Remains will lie at Jayaratne Respect Parlour from 9.00 a.m Friday 27th October 2023. Cortege leaves Jayarathna Respect Parlour at 3.30 p.m. 28th October 2023 for Cremation at General Cemetery Borella at 4 p.m.068719
